decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (106.02.01.LOC.01.01, 106-02-01-ELE-N-01, 106-02-01-ELE-S-01, 106-02-01-ELE-W-01, 106-02-01-PLN-00-01, 106-02-01-PLN-01-01, 106-02-01-PLN-02-01, 106-02-01-PLN-RF-01. Received 23 October 2015. 106-05-01-ELE-N-01 Rev. B, 106-05-01-PLN-00-01 Rev. A, 106-05-01-PLN-01-01 Rev. B. Received 20 November 2015. 106-05-01-PLN-02-01 Rev. C, 106-05-01-PLN-RF-01 Rev. C, 106-05-01-ELE-S-01 Rev. C, 106-05-01-ELE-W-01 Rev. D. Received 27 November 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension, insertion of front rooflights, installation of a front porch canopy and erection of a single storey rear extension to the house.
